name: The Very Organized Thief
description:
A thief must enter a home ans steal all of the things on the list before they are allowed to leave the house, but the homeowner comes home earlier than expected


You are a thief. A very organized thief. Find all the items on your checklist and then escape the house...

The game is designed to be neither easy or hard, and slightly different every time you play.

But Homeowner is very scary.

Use tools in your home to build key...
